response.overview: This extraordinary video includes four separate films, each taking one of the following cars as its main theme. The Audi Quattro film features the most incredible in-car sequence with Walter Rohrl. We then join the Lancia Martini team, with a strong focus on the Delta S4 and Lancia 037. By contrast, the Peugeot T16 Evolution 2 was all about Gallic style and stealth and the RS 200 was the last ‘supercar’ on the scene - and who knows what this car might have achieved if Group B hadn’t come to a sudden end in 1986. An action-packed compilation of awesome power and magnificent driving
response.title: Rally Supercars
